actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the preservation, interpretation, development and use of cultural, historic, natural and architectural urban resources through a system of national cultural parks, to establish a demonstration program to encourage the preservation and management of such resources.

summary.text: National Cultural Park Act - Establishes the Cultural Park Advisory Commission to study and formulate recommendations for the creation of a National System of Cultural Parks. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make grants for the purpose of assisting States in the preservation and use of cultural historic, natural, and architectural urban resources through a cultural park management program. Sets requirements for entitlement to such grants. Directs the Secretary to coordinate activities with other interested Federal agencies.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the preservation, interpretation, development and use of cultural, historic, natural and architectural urban resources through a system of national cultural parks, to establish a demonstration program to encourage the preservation and management of such resources.
